\w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said, “Though \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, weren’t \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;
